div.p: I HOPE THAT HELPS. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, IT'S VERY
TO CONGRESSWOMAN NANCY PELOSI. LET ME PUT THIS IN LETTER FORM.
DEAR MISS PELOSI, WHEN THE PRESS ASKS YOU A QUESTION THAT YOU
DON'T HAVE ANY IDEA ABOUT, JUST SAY THAT.
SAY YOU DON'T KNOW. DON'T DO WHAT YOU DID YESTERDAY
>> I HAVE A LOT ALLEGIANCES TO THOSE SCHOOLS.
I DON'T WANT ANYBODY TO LOSE. I'M ROOTING FOR EVERYBODY,
ESPECIALLY THE PLAYERS I WANT THEM ALL TO SUCCEED.
I'M ADDICTED TO BASKETBALL, ALL SPORTS BUT COLLEGE BASKETBALL
VERY EXCITING. >> Bill: IT'S NOT MARCH MAD,
IT'S MARCH MADNESS. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
STOP THE MADNESS. YOU DON'T KNOW ANYTHING, JUST
SAY SO. >> THAT IS IT FOR TONIGHT.
